name: LeadershipSurge
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill helps you build your leadership skills everyday little by little with Alex Willis, CEO of Leadership Surge. Alex has spent the last 15 years working with companies to improve the leadership culture within organizations. His most recent company, Leadership Surge values people over process, and focuses on a holistic, strengths-based approach to leadership. It is their mission to create a fun, interactive, and experiential learning environment for emerging leaders. Leadership Surge is bringing their successful on-the-go learning to Alexa. Start your morning energized and ready to apply learned strategies from Alex Willis. Quick segments that will help you build your leadership skills everyday.

Find Alex Willis:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/willisalexander80/
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/alexanderwillis80
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCI5U2y7ySesm7OHkVJASdVg
leadershipsurge.com
